cause.description:
West World Paper is committed to improvements in environmental sustainability. We support companies that promote sustainability such as our four paper mills: Grays Harbor , EN Paper (previously called Shinho), Potlatch Corporation, Finch & Pruyn. West World Paper is a member of the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) and is affiliated through FSC with Smart Wood as well as Rainforest Alliance. We seek to promote and sell ancient forest friendly papers.
For More Information Visit: http://www.westworldpaper.com
1. Understanding environmental issues and sharing information with our employees and our customers.
2. Striving to buy, sell and use products that are environmentally sustainable.
3. The promotion and marketing of the Forest Stewardship(FSC) logo to encourage the industry to choose green and more environmentally friendly products.
4. The use of the Eco-Audit system to show the environmental savings of using recycled papers.
5. Encourage all partners to share in our environmental commitment
cause.mission: Encourage all partners & people to share in our environmental commitment
